  • Description of the bug.  
    • Expected Behavior - Though a glow on the horizon as you approach the terminator of the night into day is to be expected. The Solar flare should only be seen once Kerbol has risen over the crest of the surface horizon, from orbit.
    • Observed Behavior - The solar flare is being project through the celestial body, while Kerbol is still well below the horizon
  • Steps to Replicate - Occurred while in Low Orbit over Minmus. Screen capture included. It was just before Kerbol crested but I could see the sun flare through the ground of Minmus well before this screenshot was taken.
  • Fixes / Workarounds (if known..) - Don't look directly at Kerbol?
